channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Outside the record hall, 17th September
item.description:
This drain really needs unblocking because it just keeps filling up with water. Please unblock soon many people work in the offices and have difficult access.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Baldwins Gardens, Holborn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several boxes and plastic bags full of household waste, 17th September
item.description:
These items have been dumped at the side of the road and are a magnet for other fly tipping. Some items have been here for over a week with the rest arriving overnight last night.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 173, Camberwell Grove, Camberwell, London

item.title: Tree blocking street light, 17th September
item.description:
This tree outside No11 Holmbury Park has completely surrounded the street lamp so there is no light on the pavement area, also the light is on 24hrs because the light sensor is in the dark. This has been getting worse as the tree has grown over the last two/three years.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Holmbury Park, Elmstead, London

item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag (Estates)

item.title: Request for Clean-Up – King Hall Road to Clock House Stationand the allway run run from king hall road by 80 king hall road up to clock house station, 17th September
item.description:
Urgent Request for Clean-Up – King Hall Road to Clock House Station I’m writing to raise concerns about the alleyway running from the King Hall Road end up to Clock House Station. The area has become severely overgrown with weeds and is littered with rubbish. It appears that no maintenance has taken place for several months. This pathway is regularly used by pedestrians, and its current condition poses safety risks—especially in poor lighting or wet weather, where overgrowth and litter can lead to slips, trips, or other accidents. It also creates an unpleasant environment for the community. I kindly urge the management team to inspect the area and arrange for a clean-up as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Percy Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet
